law.catch_line: Conveyances to be made by commissioner -- Deed of partition.
law.text: Unless otherwise specially ordered by the court, the master commissioner of a Circuit Court shall make all conveyances of real property that are authorized by law to be made by a commissioner of the Circuit Court. In the partition of land, there shall be but one (1) deed, unless otherwise ordered by the court.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 406.
